attributes.action: stop subsidised meals and drinks in parliment for M.P
attributes.additional_details:
Why cannot M,P s pay for their own meals and drinks,

Remove all subsidies and let them pay out of their own wages, they have to eat anyway, why sould  the people pay for them. they want to cut benifits to the sick and old . so be it .
Remember the pledge.
WE ARE ALL IN IT TOGETHER , NOW LET US SEE
